step1Title: Welcome to Rarin, your riverside celebration space
step1WeddingDescription: Please choose a budget range that suits you

step2SubDescription.wedding: Including decoration, ceremony services, and venue with weekday discounts available
step2SubDescription.event:
No venue rental fee when food & beverage minimum is met. 
Event duration is 6 hours, with 3 hours for setup and 1 hour for teardown, totaling 10 hours.
step2SubDescription.photo: Can set up before 00:00 on the previous day if the venue is available (check availability again). No additional charges for decoration or lighting setup.
